Title: Enacts the "institutional investor recovery act"
Summary: Enacts the "institutional investor recovery act"; relates to an action by certain public retirement systems or multi-employer health and welfare plans organized under the Taft-Hartley act.
LawCode: Add ยง353-b, amd ยง353, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to enacting the "institutional investor recovery act"
